script.description: Mix of string functions, mostly using CEL-native functions
script.code: string(bar.contains('a')) + '/' + string(bar.contains('x')) + ' : ' + string(bar.matches('F.*B')) + '/' + string(bar.matches('X.*Y')) + ' : ' + string(bar.startsWith('F')) + '/' + string(bar.startsWith('X')) + ' : ' + string(bar.endsWith('r')) + '/' + string(bar.endsWith('Z'))
